H!Hector.desc: Deals 20 damage to foes within 3 columns centered on unit.

P!Ephraim.desc: Infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces of unit (including unit) can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

WI!Marth.desc: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 and [Bonus Doubler] to armored and flying allies within 3 rows centered on unit. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

SU!Mia.desc: Grants [Resonance: Blades] to unit and allies from the same titles as unit.
